com.github.manevolent.jbot.command.search

Interface SearchHandler.Clause<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - search entity type.
    Enclosing interface:
    SearchHandler<T>

    public static interface SearchHandler.Clause<T>
    Represents a WHERE clause.
